channel.title: Domain Name System (DNS) :: HackForge
channel.description: General Try zone transfer without domain dig axfr @$ip Try zone transfer guessing the domain dig axfr @$ip $domain Regular DNS request dig ANY @$ip $domain IPv6 DNS request dig AAAA @$ip $domain Get TXT Records dig TXT @$ip $domain Get MX Records dig MX @$ip $domain Get NS records of the given domain dig NS @$ip $domain Reverse lookup dig -x 192.168.0.2 @$ip Reverse IPv6 lookup
